trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_00<tab>Ojika Tsunjika has a message for you.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_01<tab>Ojika Tsunjika has had word from Erenville─apparently the gleaner's efforts to secure passage to Tural aboard a guildship vessel were successful. The administration officer bids you wait in the main hall while he informs the rest of your travel companions.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_02<tab>Gathered together, you and the others reaffirm your reasons for undertaking the journey west, as well as your support of Wuk Lamat's bid for the throne. Satisfied that everyone is committed to the cause, Erenville suggests you make ready to depart.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_03<tab>The time to leave Sharlayan behind has come. Board the guildship vessel and undertake the journey to Tural.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_04<tab>With a vast stretch of ocean still between you and Tural's shores, Krile suggests you pass the time by conversing with your fellow shipmates─some of whom have made the trip to Tuliyollal before.
※In the event that you leave the ship, you may resume your voyage by speaking with the sprightly sailor in Scholar's Harbor.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_05<tab>Your brief bout of socialization has yielded insights into what to expect when you arrive at your destination. Krile may be interested to hear what you have learned.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_06<tab>The ship is beset by a terrible storm, but thanks to the heroic actions of those on board, the passengers and crew survive to see the seas grow calm once more. Your vessel sails on, the sight of wheeling seabirds signaling that Tural is now but a short distance away. Erenville explains that the larger vessel is unable to enter the city's harbor, so you board a landing boat alongside your comrades.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_07<tab>You at last make landfall in Tuliyollal─much to the relief of Wuk Lamat and her roiling stomach. Upon your arrival, you are accosted by Turali soldiers, who are quickly put at ease by the reassurances of the Third Promise.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SEQ_08<tab>Stoic as ever, Erenville stands ready to guide you as you take your first steps into the vibrant city of Tuliyollal. Go forth and see what adventure awaits!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_00<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_03<tab>Speak with your shipmates.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_001<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I've just had word from Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_002<tab>It seems he's managed to secure passage to Tural aboard a guildship vessel.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_003<tab>Why don't you wait in the main hall while I go and inform your travel companions? It should only take a moment.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_010<tab>Your next grand adventure begins, eh?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Ojika gave us the good news. We've made ready to set sail at a moment's notice.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_021<tab>The only one yet to arrive is Erenville himself...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_100_022<tab>Ah, you're all here.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_022<tab>It took some persuasion, but the gleaners' guildship has granted us places aboard a vessel bound for Tural.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_023<tab>There'll be other passengers─researchers and artisans and the like─so we'll need to share deck space.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_024<tab>That's fine, Erenville. I doubt anyone expected we'd have a ship all to ourselves.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_025<tab>They're not casting off just yet, so if you have any lingering concerns, now is the time to voice them.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_026<tab>I wouldn't call it a concern, but everyone's still clear on what it is we'll be doing in Tural, yes?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_027<tab>We've not forgotten.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_028<tab>The nation of Tuliyollal is in the midst of deciding its next ruler.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>As your chosen allies, we shall assist you during the rite of succession, and support your bid to become Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>In addition to that, Alphinaud and I have another objective.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_031<tab>As part of its reconstruction, Garlemald seeks ways to reconcile and reengage with its neighbors.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_032<tab>By visiting Tural, we hope to learn more about how its myriad cultures interact with one another. How they find common ground, develop stronger ties─the sort of insights that might help our friends in Ilsabard.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>But we'll pursue this goal in our own time. You can be assured that we'll give the contest all due attention.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_034<tab>That's all I ask. Otherwise, you're welcome to do as you like.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>You wanted to find out about your grandfather, right, Krile?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_036<tab>Yes. As far as we could determine from the old missive I found, he had been tasked with investigating the golden city by your father, the Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_037<tab>Yet oddly enough, we have no record of that investigation in our archives, and nothing to explain the earring which accompanied the letter.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_038<tab>Thus for reasons both official and personal, I should very much like to get to the bottom of this mystery.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_039<tab>I'm sure there'll be a chance to speak with Papa. You can get your answers right from the source!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_040<tab>I look forward to meeting him.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>In any case, you're not the only one with an interest in the city of gold.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>The golden city is a children's bedtime story. I am part of this expedition only because the Third Promise has commanded that I serve as guide.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_043<tab>Still playing the part of the stoic servant, I see.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_044<tab>What of you? Don't you dare tell me you've changed your mind!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_A1_000_001<tab>Hoist sail and let the wind take us as she pleases!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_A1_000_002<tab>We won't make you Dawnservant by standing here and talking about it.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_A1_000_003<tab>I go wheresoever adventure is to be found...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_046<tab>Well said! We won't get far wallowing in the shallows!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_047<tab>Hah! A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of action!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_048<tab>Heh, that's what they tell me.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_049<tab>Right, then. If all are still committed to the journey, then I say we make ready to depart.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_060<tab>Eager as they are, the others have already left for the harbor.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_061<tab>We're not in danger of missing the boarding call, but perhaps we should be on our way as well.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_080<tab>Have you spoken with our shipmates? Tural is still a good distance away, and it might be a pleasant way to pass the time.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_085<tab>Deep breaths... Deep breaths...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>I can feel my edge start to dull on these long sea voyages. How about some light sparring later?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>I'm told this vessel has been equipped with a barrier generator to protect it from storms.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_100<tab>A reassuring thought─though I nevertheless pray there will be no need for it...

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GUILDSHIP04860_000_105<tab>I'd heard Erenville was looking for passage to Tuliyollal, so I managed to squeeze his party aboard one of our chartered vessels. As fortune would have it, we had just scheduled an expedition to Tural.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_Q2_000_000<tab>Resume your voyage to Tural?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_000_110<tab>Hm? Oh, this will be my first visit to Tural.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_000_111<tab>Fonjeantaine's the name. I was working at Eshtaime's Aesthetics in Ul'dah, you see, but my employment with them, uh...came to an end.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_100_111<tab>That's why I visited Sharlayan, in the hopes of starting over. While I was attempting─and failing─to find a new job, I seized the chance to board this vessel when I overheard room for another passenger had suddenly opened up.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_000_112<tab>I'm told the Dawnservant welcomes all regardless of origin, and so Tuliyollal seemed like the perfect place to begin anew.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_000_113<tab><sigh> Hopefully things will be better this time...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_FONJEANTAINE_000_115<tab>I wonder what the city will be like...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SAILORSUNBURNED_000_120<tab>Did you want to make a wager? We're taking bets on who'll be sat next in the Dawnservant's shiny chair.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SAILORSUNBURNED_000_121<tab>There are four claimants in the rite of succession─your young Wuk Lamat being one of them, of course.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SAILORSUNBURNED_000_122<tab>But from what a Mamool Ja bloke was telling us, the other three are all strong contenders. Not too many keen to risk their coin on the Third Promise.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SAILORSUNBURNED_000_123<tab>Wait, I recognize you─you're the champion of Eorzea! If the Third Promise has you on her side, then that shifts the odds a fair bit! I might have to change my bet...

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ADVENTURER04860_000_130<tab>My story? Well, since you asked, I wanted to retrace the historic journey of the great Ketenramm. You know─the first Eorzean to set foot on Tural, almost eighty years ago.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ADVENTURER04860_000_131<tab>The Mamool Ja's leader is said to have welcomed Ketenramm with open arms, and sent him home with a bounty of silverware as a token of their friendship.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ADVENTURER04860_000_132<tab>But the real treasure was the crops he brought back─popotoes, tomatoes, and corn─which spread across Eorzea like wildfire. His grand adventure led to a culinary revolution!

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ADVENTURER04860_000_133<tab>The tales say Ketenramm returned to Tural several times after that, but his ship vanished during his last recorded voyage, and he was never heard from again. That even a seasoned explorer like him could meet such an end is testimony to the ocean's peril...

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ADVENTURER04860_000_135<tab>Some parts of Tural are said to be so remote that not even Ketenramm made it to them. If I could explore those places, then perhaps I'll become even more famous than him!
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GIGIMOLU_000_140<tab>An adventurer, I presume?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GIGIMOLU_000_141<tab>I'm a merchant myself, based in Ul'dah. Specialty imports and exports, Eorzean and Turali both.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GIGIMOLU_000_142<tab>If this is your first “crossing the salt,” as they say, do remember that the social mores of Eorzea are not necessarily the same as those over yonder.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GIGIMOLU_000_143<tab>Consider this: it is not uncommon for the various races to be referred to instead by the names of certain clans. For the Miqo'te, the Hhetsarro; the Hrothgar, the Xbr'aal. Not because every member of a given clan is of the same race, mind, but because many individuals of said race are associated with that clan. A fair assumption, in certain cases─but take care not to give offense.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_GIGIMOLU_000_145<tab>The goods I'm bringing over on this trip are a rare sight to the Turali, so I expect to make a decent profit. The local merchants are an <var 1A 02 /var>agreeable<var 1A 01 /var> folk.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_HOOBIGOMERCENARY04860_000_150<tab>I see you in Eorzea before. You great and famous hero.

TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_HOOBIGOMERCENARY04860_000_151<tab>...Gah, I've had enough of playing the simpleton. There was a time when we took great pains to maintain the deception, but with more of you Eorzeans coming to Tural, it's become impractical.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_HOOBIGOMERCENARY04860_000_152<tab>Besides, my mercenary days are over. Too many of our warband have fallen, and so we head home to lick our wounds...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_HOOBIGOMERCENARY04860_000_155<tab>I look forward to a long soak in the hot springs of Urqopacha. And no complaints when I dance the bathing dance.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_160<tab>Did you learn anything of interest?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_161<tab>Oh! I hadn't heard that about the clan names. We should have Wuk Lamat and Erenville teach us the ones we should know.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_162<tab>Actually, it's getting a little chilly up here on deck. Let's all gather in the cabin.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_WUKLAMAT_000_180<tab>Ahhh, it's so nice to feel that familiar breeze again... I wasn't sure my stomach would make it.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_KRILE_000_185<tab>I wonder what kind of trouble those soldiers are expecting?
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALPHINAUD_000_190<tab>According to Erenville, the Vanu I thought I saw belongs to a clan known as the Hanuhanu. It seems they share more than a physical resemblance.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ALISAIE_000_195<tab>What an amazing city─as lively as Ul'dah, and even more colorful...
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_ERENVILLE_000_200<tab>Well, despite the storm's efforts to the contrary, here we are. Safe and sound.
TEXT_KINGMA101_04860_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have arrived in Tuliyollal! You can return to the city at any time by speaking with the sprightly sailor in Scholar's Harbor in Old Sharlayan.
